root.name: Outlaw Volleyball
root.description: Gameplay Outlaw Volleyball follows standard volleyball rules; however, there are a few game modes that adds twists to the gameplay. Hot Potato: The ball has a countdown timer. When it reaches 0, the ball explodes upon impact with the nearest player. Casino: The players win money based on how long the volley lasts. Side Out: Only the serving team can score. Players can also fight the opposing players to steal their momentum bar. Characters The game features 16 selectable characters, each embodying one of a variety of stereotypes: Leon: The athlete. Lizzy: The punk girl. El Suave: The ladies man. Shawnee: The Native America girl. Ice Trey: The lame rapper. Scrummy: The drunk Irishman. Nikki: The groupie. Killer Miller: The ex-con. Harvest: The hippie girl. Doe Joe: The Japanese tourist. Summer: The sexy blonde bombshell. Harley: The biker chick. Natasha: The tough Russian chick. Clem: The hillbilly. Donna: The valley girl. Chica: The proud Latin. The game's announcer is voiced by Steve Carell. Tour Locations The game features volleyball courts in 10 different locations: Tar Beach: The Bronx, New YorkThe Big House: Joliet, IllinoisColon Avenue: Staten Island, New YorkStinky Falls: Newark, New JerseyConey Island: Brooklyn, New YorkThird Rail Junction: Queens, New YorkThe Ice Box: AntarcticaThe Bone Yard: Salem, MassachusettsJungle Fever: PeruCasa de Guapo: Fundijo Canyon, Mexico
